name: id
description: Primary key: Unique identifier for the CPA firm.

name: contact_name
description: Primary contact person for the CPA firm.

name: contact_email
description: Email address of the CPA firm's primary contact.

name: contact_phone
description: Phone number of the CPA firm's primary contact.

name: address
description: Street address of the CPA firm.

name: city
description: City where the CPA firm is located.

name: state
description: Two-letter state abbreviation where the firm is located.

name: zip_code
description: ZIP code of the CPA firm's address.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the CPA firm record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the CPA firm record was last updated.
